availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Fayette County, Kentucky native. Married to Cornelia Smith Simrall. Father of Nellie Simrall. Graduated Centre College Studied law under Judge George Robertson and graduated Louisville Law School in 1861. Practiced in partnership with William S. Bodley

bibl.p: H. Levin, The Lawyers and Lawmakers of Kentucky (Chicago: The Lewis Publishing Company, 1897), 224-225. Find A Grave, "Judge John Graham Simrall (1840-1908)," Memorial #94568185, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=94568185&ref=acom (accessed July, 12, 2017).
